name: Pavor
description:
(Game will be continued by (Felipe Nanni, Thiago Kozusko and Vinicius Augusto) at:   https://gamejolt.com/games/pavor/286031 )

"They saw you as a friend. But the didn't know about the mask behind the mask!"

Kill everyone at the party without being seen and escape before the police arrives!

Developed by Pavorosos team (Bruno Guetter, Felipe Nanni, Thiago Kozusko and Vinicius Augusto).
Illustration by Cajila Barbosa.

If you make a video playing our game, we'd love to watch! :)

  • Can be played with a Xbox Controller (original experience) and we've just added Mouse + Keyboard support!

The art was inspired by the work of Brendan Sullivan.

Musics:
Diogo Cadaval - Maria Teresa
Mercury - The Wolf
Mombojo - Passarinho Colorido
Wolf Asylum - Pink
Forget the Whale - Another Trick up my sleeve
Poly Action - Ten Hundred Years
